techseed.TextfieldAutoSuggestor

Class AutoSuggestor

  • java.lang.Object
    • techseed.TextfieldAutoSuggestor.AutoSuggestor

  • public class AutoSuggestor
extends java.lang.Object
    * AutoSuggestor provides an auto-completion popup for a JTextField, fetching suggestions dynamically from a database table based on user input.

    It shows a JPopupMenu with a JList of suggestions matching the current text in the JTextField. Suggestions are queried from the specified database table and columns using a LIKE '%input%' search.

    Usage: 

         AutoSuggestor suggestor = new AutoSuggestor(
      myTextField,
      myDbConnection,
      "mysql_table_name",
      Arrays.asList("col1", "col2"),
      "CustomerID",
      null, //Image Icon
      (id, label) -> { System.out.println("Selected ID: " + id + ", Label: " + label); }
    );
 suggestor.setSuggestionFont(new Font("Segoe UI", Font.PLAIN, 16));
 suggestor.setPopupSize(300, 180);
    This example listens for selections and prints the selected id and label.
    Since:
    2025

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutoSuggestor

        public AutoSuggestor(javax.swing.JTextField textField,
                     java.sql.Connection connection,
                     java.lang.String tableName,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchColumns,
                     java.lang.String idColumn,
                     javax.swing.Icon icon,
                     java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> onSelectCallback)
        Constructs an AutoSuggestor for a given JTextField and database parameters.
        Parameters:
        textField - The JTextField to attach the auto-suggestion feature.
        connection - The active JDBC Connection to your database.
        tableName - The database table name to search for suggestions.
        searchColumns - The list of columns to search (LIKE) for matching text.
        idColumn - The column name containing unique IDs for the records.
        icon - An optional Icon to show alongside suggestions (currently unused).
        onSelectCallback - A callback function accepting (id, label) when a suggestion is selected.

    • Method Detail

        Sets the font used in the suggestion list popup.

        public void setPopupSize(int width,
                         int height)
        Sets the size of the suggestion popup.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the popup in pixels.
        height - Height of the popup in pixels.
